# format

**Instance Property**

The pixel format of the image accumulator.

## Declaration

```swift
var format: CIFormat { get }
```

## Discussion

For applicable values, see Pixel Formats.

## Obtaining Data From an Image Accumulator

- **extent**: The extent of the image associated with the image accumulator.
- **image()**: Returns the current contents of the image accumulator.
